languages.text: В бою персонажу может понадобиться разное оружие — подготовьте его заранее. Откройте Инвентарь [{bind|OpenInventory}] и подготовьте разные комплекты оружия в окне экипировки. Чтобы изменить комплект оружия в бою, нажмите [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}]. Смена комплекта оружия в бою не тратит очки действий.

In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Open your inventory [{bind|OpenInventory}] and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, press [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}].
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.
languages.original_text: В бою персонажу может понадобиться разное оружие — подготовьте его заранее. Откройте Инвентарь [{bind|OpenInventory}] и подготовьте разные комплекты оружия в окне экипировки. Чтобы изменить комплект оружия в бою, нажмите [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}]. Смена комплекта оружия в бою не тратит очки действий.

traits.locale_text:
In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Open your inventory [{bind|OpenInventory}] and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, press [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}].
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Open your inventory [{bind|OpenInventory}] and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, press [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}].
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Open your inventory [{bind|OpenInventory}] and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, press [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}].
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Open your inventory [{bind|OpenInventory}] and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, press [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}].
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Open your inventory [{bind|OpenInventory}] and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, press [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}].
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

languages.text:
在战斗中，您的角色可能需要各种不同种类的武器，您可以提前准备好这些武器。按下[{bind|OpenInventory}]打开物品栏，准备不同的武器套装。若想在战斗中切换到其他武器套装，请按下[{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}]。
在战斗中切换武器套装并不会耗费{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text:
In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Open your inventory [{bind|OpenInventory}] and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, press [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}].
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
在战斗中，您的角色可能需要各种不同种类的武器，您可以提前准备好这些武器。按下[{bind|OpenInventory}]打开物品栏，准备不同的武器套装。若想在战斗中切换到其他武器套装，请按下[{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}]。
在战斗中切换武器套装并不会耗费{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text:
戦闘では、キャラクターはさまざまな種類の武器を使う必要があるかもしれないが、あらかじめ用意しておくことができる。インベントリ [{bind|OpenInventory}] を開き、さまざまな武器セットを用意しよう。戦闘中に別の武器セットに切り替えるには、[{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}] を押す。
戦闘中に武器セットを交換しても{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}は消費されない。
languages.original_text:
In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Open your inventory [{bind|OpenInventory}] and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, press [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}].
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘では、キャラクターはさまざまな種類の武器を使う必要があるかもしれないが、あらかじめ用意しておくことができる。インベントリ[{bind|OpenInventory}]を開き、さまざまな武器セットを用意しよう。戦闘中に別の武器セットに切り替えるには、[{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}]を押す。
戦闘中に武器セットを交換しても{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}は消費されない。

languages.text:
Durante el combate, cabe la posibilidad de que un personaje necesite distintos tipos de armas, pero puedes prepararlas con antelación. Abre tu inventario [{bind|OpenInventory}] y prepara varias configuraciones de armas. Mantén [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}] para cambiar a una configuración de armas distinta durante el combate.
El cambio de conjuntos de armas no consume {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g}.
languages.original_text:
In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Open your inventory [{bind|OpenInventory}] and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, press [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}].
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Durante el combate, cabe la posibilidad de que un personaje necesite distintos tipos de armas, pero puedes prepararlas con antelación. Abre tu inventario [{bind|OpenInventory}] y prepara varias configuraciones de armas. Mantén [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}] para cambiar a una configuración de armas distinta durante el combate.
El cambio de conjuntos de armas no consume {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g}.

languages.text:
Im Kampf kann es vorkommen, dass ein Charakter verschiedene Waffen benutzen muss, die bereits im Vorfeld vorbereitet werden können. Öffne dein Inventar [{bind|OpenInventory}] und bereite verschiedene Waffensets vor. Drücke [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}], um im Kampf zu einem anderen Waffenset zu wechseln.
Das Wechseln von Waffensets im Kampf kostet keine {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g}.
languages.original_text:
In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Open your inventory [{bind|OpenInventory}] and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, press [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}].
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Im Kampf kann es vorkommen, dass ein Charakter verschiedene Arten von Waffen benutzen muss, die im Voraus vorbereitet werden können. Öffne dein Inventar [{bind|OpenInventory}] und bereite verschiedene Waffensets vor. Drücke [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}], um im Kampf zu einem anderen Waffenset zu wechseln.
Das Wechseln von Waffensets im Kampf kostet keine {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g}.

languages.text:
Au combat, un personnage peut avoir besoin d'utiliser différents types d'armes et celles-ci peuvent être préparées à l'avance. Ouvrez votre inventaire [{bind|OpenInventory}] et préparez différents ensembles d'armes. Pour changer d'ensemble d'armes en cours de combat, appuyez sur [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}].
En situation de combat, le changement d'ensemble d'armes ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}point d'action{/g}.
languages.original_text:
In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Open your inventory [{bind|OpenInventory}] and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, press [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}].
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Au combat, un personnage peut avoir besoin d'utiliser différents types d'armes et celles-ci peuvent être préparées à l'avance. Ouvrez votre inventaire [{bind|OpenInventory}] et préparez différents ensembles d'armes. Pour changer d'ensemble d'armes en cours de combat, appuyez sur [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}].
En situation de combat, le changement d'ensemble d'armes ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}point d'action{/g}.

languages.text:
Çatışmada bir karakterin farklı silah türlerini kullanması gerekebilir. Bu silahları önceden hazır etmek mümkündür. [{bind|OpenInventory}] ile envanterini aç ve farklı silah setleri hazırla. Çatışmada farklı bir silah setine geçmek için [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}] tuşuna bas.
Çatışma sırasında silah seti değiştirmek {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}eylem puanı{/g} harcamaz.
languages.original_text:
In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Open your inventory [{bind|OpenInventory}] and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, press [{bind|ChangeWeaponSet}].
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.
